decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and shall be so maintained thereafter.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order amending or revoking and re-enacting that Order, with or without modification), no window or other glazed opening shall be formed in south-facing side elevation of the extension hereby permitted.

Condition : 6 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site before 0800 hours or after 1800 hours on Mondays to Friday and before 0800 hours or after 1300 hours on Saturdays and no work shall take place on Sundays and public holidays, except when prior agreement has been given by the Local Planning Authority in writing.

Condition : 7 - No development shall take place until full details have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority of all the measures to be taken to protect the roots of the trees and shrubs situated adjacent to the site within the rear garden of No. 380 Jersey Road and these works shall be carried out as approved.

Condition : 8 - The details required to be submitted and approved in writing by condition 6) shall include details of existing and proposed functional services above and below ground (e.g. drainage, power, communications cables, pipelines etc.); all functional services to the house and the proposed extension shall be provided in accordance with the approved details and no trench or excavation shall be made for this or any other purpose which affects any part of any tree or shrub adjacent to the site.
description: Amendment to existing planning application 00647/382/P3 to move existing entrance and addition of an integral garage to ground floor of existing house.
